name: Lazy treasure cat 怠惰な宝猫
name_original: Lazy treasure cat 怠惰な宝猫
description:
This is a casual synthesis game, synthesis your cat to unlock more planets

In a universe parallel to ours, there is a group of evolved cats who challenge various galaxies for the survival of their species. Come and help them complete their exploration!

--More than 50 cat shapes

--Collect illustrations

--Unlock planets
